message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn! How about a 55/45 split in my favor? This accounts for the inflation disadvantage I have.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to go down to 58-42. It's a fair compromise.

Alice, this is getting critical. My last offer. A 51/49 split, recognizing the inflation pressure we're both under.  Take it or leave it.
